name: Fundacja EkoRozwoju
membership: Koalicja Klimatyczna, Koalicja Sprawiedliwego Handlu, Koalicja "Ratujmy Rzeki", European Avenue Working Group and others
goal: Created in 1991, Fundacja EkoRozwoju (FER, Foundation for Sustainable Development) aims to promote sustainable development. The Foundation acts in the areas of environmental quality, nature conservation, grassroots activism, and international sustainable development. Currently, FER concentrates on improving urban air quality, combating climate change, protecting trees in man-made landscapes (urban and rural), food self-sufficiency, environmental education. FER manages EkoCentrum Wrocław, an environmental education centre.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Energy, Environment
euInitiatives: Biodiversity Strategy, green infrastructure, European Green Deal, Common Agricultural Policy, transportation policies,
